name: Army Craft
description:
Someone can think that one man can’t win a war. During the game you will see the opposite.
You have to confront hordes of enemy infantry and military equipment. Advance your cannon
to stand a siege. For fallen soldiers receive munificent reward which you can spend on
powerful weapons. Fight in any weather for your home. It's time to show them who is the
real hero of the war!

Key features:
* Arsenal of powerful weapons to fight enemies!
* The opportunity to upgrade your gun directly during the game!
* Change of locations will not let you get bored!
* Difficult bosses - try to kill them!
* Atmospheric music!
